Title: Gomorrah
Writer: Leonardo Fasoli, Stefano Bises, Roberto Saviano, Ludovica Rampoldi, Giovanni Bianconi
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Salvatore Esposito, Fortunato Cerlino, Cristina Donadio
Plot: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.
